焙.definition: to dry over a fire; to bake

焙乾.definition: to dry over a fire; to roast

焙果.definition: variant of 貝果|贝果[bei4 guo3]

焙烤.definition: to bake; to roast; to kiln

焙煎.definition: to dry and roast over a low fire (tea, chestnuts, seaweed etc); to torrefy

焙燒.definition: to roast; to bake (e.g. mineral ore)
